Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at 63rd/Cottage Grove. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
